common.title: Digi-ID authentication
qrmethod.body1: Open test wallet in other browser window and load coreID.
qrmethod.body2: In this view, copy QR code as URI by pressing your right mouse button over QR-code.
qrmethod.body3: Paste copied URI link as text to "Login response" field in test wallet SIOP section and continue there.
mobilemethod.body: If wallet is in use in this device, you can authenticate with it.
success.body1: If page is not loading automatically within 10 seconds, you can click
